name: Smith & Co. Mercantile
description: Original tenant that sold general merchandise, dry goods, and supplies to the growing Fort Collins community.

name: Linden Street Hardware
description: Hardware store that served local builders and homeowners during Fort Collins' expansion period.

name: Thompson's Books
description: Independent bookstore known for its extensive collection of Western literature and history.

name: Riverside Cafe
description: Popular gathering spot serving coffee, pastries, and light meals to locals and visitors.

name: Frontier Antiques
description: Specialized in Western American antiques, furniture, and collectibles from the 19th and early 20th centuries.

name: Urban Outfitters
description: Contemporary clothing and lifestyle store catering to college students and young professionals.

name: Craft Brewing Co.
description: Local craft brewery and taproom showcasing innovative beers and hosting community events.

name: Digital Nomad Workspace
description: Modern coworking space providing flexible work environments for entrepreneurs, freelancers, and remote workers.
